How would this (https://t.co/uGhvWtrKZZ) work in web3 world:
- Ppl install a sensor on their water faucet to earn the daily reward, use-water-as-mining - Sensor collects data to IoTeX network - Open data being used meritocratically produces value, which backs the daily reward
